H0.text: Flying is a process that is common to most living things.

H1.text: Talking is the process common to most living things.

H2.text: Seeing is a process common to most living things.

H3.text: Reproducing is a process common to most living things.

A4.text: Most plants have the ability to reproduce asexually and the ant species Mycocepurus smithii is thought to reproduce entirely by asexual means.

A5.text: Most animals (including humans) and plants reproduce sexually.
